A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was going into this movie with high expectations and a lot of excitement. After 2 years of waiting\, I was finally going to learn more about the mysterious supreme leader Snoke\, see Luke Skywalker in action and how powerful he is now after all this time. I thought Luke and Rey were going to build a stronger bond and Luke would show her the way and train her more. To my disappointment very little of this happened and I actually left the theater frustrated and a bit unsatisfied. I'd have to say this was my least favorite star wars film in the saga :(
